Title: Swing Vote
Writer: Michael Tolkin, Ann Biderman (created by), Gina Welch (staff writer), Lenore Zion (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Ray attempts to reconnect with his family while dealing with the potential deal of a lifetime with the Finneys, Bridget connects with her teacher while Bunchy seeks out romance from Teresa.
